department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
"腫瘤免疫學是生物學的一個跨學科分支，專注於理解免疫系統在癌症進展過程中與癌細胞的相互作用。此課程提供學生理解基礎免疫學知識, 腫瘤組成, 以及免疫系統於治療癌症的基礎與應用學理。

（請注意：修課學生須具生物或醫學背景）"
goal.en:
"Tumor immunology is an interdisciplinary branch of biology that focuses on understanding the immune reactivity to tumor. This course provides students with knowledge of basic immunology, tumor components, and the rationale of tumor immunotherapy.

 (Students must have basic knowledge of biology or medical science)"

outline.ch:
"1.Introduction of cellular and molecular immunity
2.Innate immune sytem
3.Adaptive immune system
4.Antibodies and antigens
5.Major histocompatibility complex
6.Antigen processing and presentation
7.Development of immune cells-I
8.Development of immune cells-II
9.期中考
10.Mechanism of immune response-cytokines
11.Mechanism of cell mediated immune response
12.Mechanism of antibody medicated immune response
13.Immunity to pathogens
14.Transplant immunology
15.Tumor immunology-I
16.Tumor immunology-II
17.Immunotherapy
18.期末考"
outline.en:
"1.Introduction of cellular and molecular immunity

textbook.ch:
"1.Cellular and Molecular Immunology 9th Edition. Abul K. Abbas MBBS (Author), Andrew H. H. Lichtman MD PhD (Author), Shiv Pillai MBBS PhD (Author)
2. Cancer Immunotherapy Principles and Practice (2017)
by Lisa H. Butterfield PhD (Editor), Howard L. Kaufman MD FACS (Editor), Francesco M. Marincola MD FACS (Editor)"

"1.Cellular and Molecular Immunology 9th Edition. Abul K. Abbas MBBS (Author), Andrew H. H. Lichtman MD PhD (Author), Shiv Pillai MBBS PhD (Author)
2. Cancer Immunotherapy Principles and Practice (2017)

gradMethod.ch:
"midterm exam: 30%, final exam: 30%, attendance rate: 20%, assignment: 20%

前兩次課不得缺席"
gradMethod.en:
"midterm exam: 30%, final exam: 30%, attendance rate: 20%, assignment: 20%

Must not be absent from the first two courses"
